Enum ScoreOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ScoreOption>
      • ScoreOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ScoreOption>
    public enum ScoreOption
extends java.lang.Enum<ScoreOption>
    Enumerator for different scoring options.
